item.title: Terminal filemanager
item.description: If you are a terminal enthusiast like me, you appreciate every tool which will make your workflow faster and/or cooler in the terminal. File browsing is something we do day in, day out. This can get tedious, exspecially in the terminal. For me I really like the movement in vim so I was looking for a filemanager which support that kind of navigation, so I found ranger, the cli filemanger.
